original_text: until the Ancient of Days came, and judgment was given for the saints of the Most High, and the time came when the saints possessed the kingdom.
korean_text: 옛적부터 항상 계신 이가 와서 지극히 높으신 이의 성도들을 위하여 원한을 풀어 주셨고 때가 이르매 성도들이 나라를 얻었더라

sentences.original_text: until the Ancient of Days came
and judgment was given for the saints of the Most High
sentences.korean_translation: 가장 높으신 이의 성도들을 위해 심판이 베풀어졌고

sentences.original_text: and the time came when the saints possessed the kingdom
